morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. 1 new trail opened today.

morningBrief.body: 112/142 trails spinning, 55 freshly groomed. Windy. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow on the Way
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 7" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.
